While Clovis has his own tricks, if she were able to flank him there's a chance (depending on the layers of protection granted by the amulet) that she could give it to him the muggle way.
Clovis' amulet protects him from dragon magic, teleporting is still blocked in the manor, and she wasn't immune to being clawed by the golems.
But again, extenuating factors and individual skill and luck would decide the matter.
Reni is still a young dragon, and was struggling against the old guardians.
